thread.title: Guy Tells Hilariously Painful Story About The Time He Tested A Taser Out On Himself
thread.title_full: Guy Tells Hilariously Painful Story About The Time He Tested A Taser Out On Himself

author: Mustafa Gatollari
title: Guy Tells Hilariously Painful Story About The Time He Tested A Taser Out On Himself
text:
Human beings are capable of some pretty dumb things. And the worst part is we usually know when we're doing something stupid but we just can't help ourselves -- like getting into a relationship with someone our gut instinct tells us isn't the right person for us, or eating Taco Bell drunk at 1 a.m. knowing we're going to regret it the next morning. 
But there are fewer tales more riveting and exemplary of our minds leading us to do completely stupid things than this Facebook user's story about the time he tasered himself.

Tony Welch admits what he did wasn't very intelligent, but goddamn did it lead to a hell of a story. 
imgur 
Please, don't try this at home.
